mainText:
I was introduced to the world of Apple when I got my first iPod  
classic. Now I own a complete line up of iPods plus a Mac.
I remember when you said, "Design is not just what it looks like and  
feels like. Design is how it works." It's the best description for  
your products.

Steve, you have a holistic impact on me; you will forever be remembered.
author: Lester
